title: Sporty Script Font
content:
Hi All,

I'm looking for a good substitute for the font Fleece. Attaching an image. I like the modern look of this script, as opposed to older looking options like Fenway. But I don't think this font is quite perfect - the connecting lines between the letters are a little distracting. Any help is greatly appreciated!

Thanks,

Tal

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Fleece.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100503172700/http:/typophile.com/files/Fleece.jpg) | 61.13 KB |
author: talgoretsky

comments.content:
It's actually an original Filmotype font called Label which has also been digitized as Ol' 54 [you can get it here](http://web.archive.org/web/20100503172700/http:/www.searchfreefonts.com/fonts/o4.htm)

Stuart :D
